name: Platform Gun
description:
A gun that shoots platforms!
Explore the Universe and local galaxies with the Reinheart Space Station. As a Space Station Guardian & Protector of Perimeters, you get the opportunity that wield the platform gun. A gun that shoots moves platforms for you to jump on to get to various places around the Space Station that needs a guardian.

Platform gun is a complete free experience that should take around 30 minutes to complete.

Features
  • Explore the Reinheart Space Station
  • Scale Heights with the Platform Gun
  • Glide to areas at incredible speed with the Platform Gun
  • Solve Puzzles with the Platform Gun
  • Use the Platform Gun to defeat enemies
  • Find Coins and Armor to make your escape easier
